snippet: Sotheby’s is planning to auction a trove that once belonged to Rachel Lambert Mellon, the matriarch of a family whose holdings rivaled some of America’s most well-known dynasties.
abstract: Sotheby’s is planning to auction a trove that once belonged to Rachel Lambert Mellon, matriarch of a family whose fortune and art holdings rivaled some of America’s most well-known dynasties; she was known for collecting without regard to whether an item was considered fashionable or likely to bring hefty return; her Virginia estate is on market for $70 million.
lead_paragraph: Sotheby’s is planning to auction a trove that once belonged to Rachel Lambert Mellon, the matriarch of a family whose holdings rivaled some of America’s most well-known dynasties.

headline.main: Bunny Mellon’s Keen Eye Is a Boon to Sotheby’s
headline.print_headline: Bunny Mellon’s Keen Eye Is a Boon to Sotheby’s
